dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5018 IH: Naomi Schwartz and Susan Rose Safe Parking Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carbajal (for himself, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. Vargas, and Mr. Valadao) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To authorize use of amounts from emergency solutions grants under the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to provide safe overnight parking facilities for homeless persons, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Naomi Schwartz and Susan Rose Safe Parking Act of 2025.

section.header: Safe parking as eligible activity under Emergency Solutions Grant Program

subsection.text: Section 415(a) of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11374(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: Maintenance, operation, insurance, and provision of utilities related to safe parking.

subsection.text: Section 411 of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11371) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (7) through (9) as paragraphs (8) through (10), respectively; and
by inserting after paragraph (6) the following new paragraph:
The term safe parking means an activity that—

subparagraph.text: provides homeless persons living in vehicles, including motor homes, with a safe place to park their vehicles overnight to facilitate a transition to stable housing; and
provides re-housing and supportive services to such homeless persons.
